content.rendered:
LOCATED ADJACENT TO WATERFALL ESTATES, THIS GRAND DEVELOPMENT OFFERS A RESORT LIFESTYLE

This luxury lifestyle development offers residents an unsurpassed quality of life with resort-like amenities. Located on the doorstep of Waterfall Estates, The Precinct consists of 4-, 3-, 2- and 1-bed apartments with modern, contemporary finishes. A large clubhouse consists of a formal restaurant, a business centre, an informal restaurant, a cinema/auditorium, double-storey gymnasium, wellness spa, games room, kids’ play area and swimming pool. The security measures are state-of-the-art to ensure the peace of mind of all resident families. Free weekly activities include tennis coaching, gym classes, hip-hop dancing and so much more.

Contact Wayne
Contact Phathi
Contact Zanele
Contact Wandile
Contact Terence
Contact Blessing
BROCHURE
ESTATE RULES
ESTATE VIDEO
MEET THE NEIGHBOURS
ESTATE LOCATION

ESTATE FEATURES

Bachelor, 1-bed, 2-bed, 3-bed and 4-bed apartments to rent
Sizes range from 38m² – 132m²
Rent from R7,100pm – R17,400pm
Modern open plan layouts with quality finishes
Tight security with biometric fingerprint access
Best value for money lifestyle in the Waterfall area
Close proximity to retail centres
Free internet in each apartment
Care-free living as maintenance is included
Free weekly activities and social events for kids and adults
Storage Facilities

OUTDOOR FACILITIES

Walking Trails/Paths
Children’s Play Parks
Braai Facilities
Tennis Court (FREE Weekly Classes)
Multipurpose Sports Fields
Pavilions
Basketball Court
Swimming Pool
Splash Park

INDOOR FACILITIES

Family Restaurant
Double-storey Gym (FREE Weekly Classes)
Pizzeria
Meeting Rooms
Cinema
Spa & Salon
Games Room
Laundromat

TAKE A LOOK AT SOME OF OUR LAYOUTS BELOW

THE PRECINCT IS ON SHOW 7 DAYS A WEEK FROM 9:00 UNTIL 17:00
